meanings.definition: The study of the function and disorders of the urinary system.
meanings.sent1: In urologies, experts learn about how the urinary system works.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in urologies treat patients with urinary issues.
meanings.sent3: The class on urologies was so interesting that even the students who usually slept paid attention.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to urologies was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on urologies painted a vivid picture of the urinary system.

meanings.definition: The medical specialty dealing with the urinary system and its diseases.
meanings.sent1: My uncle is a doctor who practices urologies.
meanings.sent2: Urologies is crucial for diagnosing and treating urinary infections.
meanings.sent3: The hospital's urologies department was always busy, but they never lost their sense of humor.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in urologies was a beacon of hope for many patients.
meanings.sent5: Learning about urologies helped me understand my own health better.

meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that focuses on the male reproductive system.
meanings.sent1: Urologies is essential for addressing male reproductive health concerns.
meanings.sent2: Specialists in urologies can perform surgeries to treat male infertility.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that studying urologies must be a 'ball' of fun.
meanings.sent4: His passion for urologies was as clear as day.
meanings.sent5: The professor's enthusiasm for urologies was contagious among the students.
